name: Mr & Mrs Food House తెలుగు రుచులు Goa Telugu Ruchulu

reviews.review_text:
Roadside resturant for grabbing quick bites. Inside decor and ambience is good, both indoor and outdoor sitting is available. Smoking is only allowed outside as you can guess.
However I have given it 3 star for a particular reason, the menu is very limited, only Thali based, not much variety is there.
They call it a thali and charge decent amount of 300 to 450 but all foods are limited quantity. The wooden plate and bowls look good but the curry quantity was very less, on asking for some extra curry they said everything is limited and we had to order extra bowl of rice and sambar. Taste was okayish , nothing extraordinary.
There was a guy who was well mannered and asked our preferences on how we'd like the drinks. on the other the waitress was too inexperinced and didnt even give plates and glasses before serving food and drinks.

Enough Parking is available on the road for both four and two wheelers, however the side of the entrance is a garbage dump !! See for yourself in the video.

Excellent food taste and the service is next level. Ambience is very good. Recommended for all food lovers. Definitely visit this place if you are travelling to GOA.
Overall rating is 08/10
The bill is somewhat on costlier side and if we need some more chutney it is also chargeable which is quite surprising but the tiffins we ordered Dosa and Vada tastes are very good.

Had a light dinner at this place and coming from Hyderabad, have to say the food is unapologetically authentic. Loved their spicy tomato chutney and the friendly people who warned me that it would be spicy as a headsup.
